summary: Stalinism refers to the political system under Joseph Stalin, including ideology and state administration.
full_text: Lazar Moiseyevich Kaganovich  was a Soviet politician and administrator and one of the main associates of Joseph Stalin. At his death in 1991, he was the last surviving Old Bolshevik. The Soviet Union itself outlived him by a mere five months.
title: Lazar Kaganovich
